definition: a game in which jackstones are thrown and picked up in various groups between bounces of a small rubber ball
details:
noun
- a game in which jackstones are thrown and picked up in various groups between bounces of a small rubber ball
= synonyms: jacks
- game equipment consisting of one of several small six-pointed metal pieces that are picked up while bouncing a ball in the game of jacks
= synonyms: jack
